cause.description:
Peace is free.
To smile To laugh To listen To help To give To accept To love To encourage To hope To forgive To befriend To be kind To be gentle
= PEACE
It has to start somewhere...somewhere small. It has to start in you....and me....and in all of us.
This charity is one on good faith. It requires no donation, just a promise, an concentrated effort, a deeply rooted desire to live your life, to greet all those around you, in peace.
"Peace begins with a smile." - Mother Theresa
1. Peace is free
2. Peace is a way of life
3. Peace begins in you
cause.mission: live peace, create peace and promote peace
cause.name: PeacePlease
